since 1989. Since 2018 I have obtained the Italian citizenship. I am married since 2009 and I have a s on of 9 
years old.

Clinical Pathology on 2007.

 Presentation 
 
 
My name is Mr. Dr. Grypiotis Panagiotis born in Spa rta-Greece on 26/02/1972 and I live permanently in Italy 
since 1989. Since 2018 I have obtained the Italian citizenship. I am married since 2009 and I have a s on of 9 
years old. 
I am Biologist with a Doctorate in Rheumatology and  Geriatric Experimental/Clinical and with different  
publications in International and National Reviews.  I finished my University degrees with a Specializa tion in 
Clinical Pathology on 2007.  
On 2006 I start my work experience as Technical Spe cialist at Alifax SPA and from 2006 until 2017, I w as 
working at Euroimmun Italia S.r.l company, covering  different responsibilities: Training Department, 
Diagnostic System Department, Product Manager and l atest Euroimmun Reference Laboratory Director. Sinc e 
2017 I am working directly in the HQ of Euroimmun A G (Germany) as Head of Product Management 
Automation and Software. 
During the years of my carrier, I developed coordin ating skills and this brought me from the initial p osition as 
Product Specialist to coordinating a team of 15 per sons (Product Specialists, laboratory technician, t echnical 
and Support office). Moreover I followed strategica l projects for the Italian subsidiary of Euroimmun thanks to 
my good knowledge of the product, automation and It alian market. Directly in the HQ I had the possibil ity to 
increase my Market knowledge Worldwide and actually  I am coordinating a team of 7 persons. 
I am always looking for new challenges and I consid er myself a person capable for covering responsibil ity 
positions such as Manager/Country Director or as a Sales/Marketing Director 
 
With regards 
P. Grypiotis
